alert.note: Alert for Adair; Casey; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 3:03PM EDT until May 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Russell County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Casey County in central Kentucky... East central Adair County in south central Kentucky... * Until 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/. * At 303 PM EDT/203 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Columbia, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Russell Springs, Sycamore Flat, Eli, Whittle, Windsor, Teddy, Webbs Cross Roads, Royville and Sano. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
